title: Covid-19 Booster Shots Win Broad Backing From European Regulator; The move comes weeks after the U.S. Food and Drug Administration issued a narrower endorsement of the shots
text:
The European recommendation comes weeks after an advisory panel to the Food and Drug Administration endorsed boosters in those aged 65 and older and at high risk of severe disease but stopped short of justifying them for the broader population. The FDA recommendation applied only to the Pfizer shot, and it is still considering evidence for booster shots of the Moderna and J&J vaccines.

Write to Denise Roland at Denise.Roland@wsj.com

Covid-19 Booster Shots Win Broad Backing From European Regulator
